content:
Generate a single page HTML app in a single Markdown code block.
ALWAYS end with a ONE-LINE information-rich summary of the change. Begin the line with ðŸ’¡
Draw an animated SVG with an interesting design

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
<title>Animated SVG Design</title>
<style>
  body {
    margin: 0;
    background-color: #111;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    height: 100vh;
  }
  svg {
    width: 300px;
    height: 300px;
  }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<svg viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Dynamic rotating radial grid -->
  <g id="grid" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.7">
    <!-- Radial lines -->
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(15 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(30 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(45 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(60 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(75 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(90 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(105 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(120 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(135 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(150 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(165 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(180 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(195 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(210 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(225 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(240 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(255 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(270 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(285 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(300 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(315 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(330 100 100)"/>
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(345 100 100)"/>
    <!-- Concentric circles -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="30" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.7"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="50" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.7"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="70" stroke="#39ff14" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.7"/>
  </g>
</svg>
<script>
  // Animate rotation of the entire grid group
  const grid = document.getElementById('grid');
  let angle = 0;
  function animate() {
    angle = (angle + 0.5) % 360;
    grid.setAttribute('transform', `rotate(${angle} 100 100)`);
    requestAnimationFrame(animate);
  }
  animate();
</script>
</body>
</html>
```
ðŸ’¡ This code creates an animated, rotating radial grid with concentric circles, producing an engaging dynamic design!

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
<title>Dynamic Flare SVG</title>
<style>
  body {
    margin: 0;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c3e50);
    height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }
  svg {
    width: 80vmin;
    height: 80vmin;
  }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<svg viewBox="0 0 300 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Center pulsating glow -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="40" fill="#39ff14" opacity="0.2">
    <animate attributeName="r" values="40;80;40" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.2;0.8;0.2" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  <!-- Rotating lines with color gradient and shimmering effect -->
  <g id="lines" stroke="url(#grad)" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round">
    <!-- Generate multiple lines dynamically with spacing -->
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(15 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(30 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(45 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(60 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(75 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(90 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(105 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(120 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(135 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(150 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(165 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(180 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(195 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(210 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(225 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(240 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(255 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(270 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(285 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(300 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(315 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(330 150 150)"/>
    <line x1="150" y1="150" x2="150" y2="20" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(345 150 150)"/>
    <!-- Dynamic circle -->
    <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="20" fill="#39ff14" opacity="0.3">
      <animate attributeName="r" values="20;60;20" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.3;1;0.3" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </circle>
  </g>
  <!-- Color gradient for lines -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="grad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#00ffe0" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff00e0" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>
<script>
  const linesGroup = document.getElementById('lines');
  let rotationAngle = 0;
  function animate() {
    rotationAngle = (rotationAngle + 0.7) % 360;
    linesGroup.setAttribute('transform', `rotate(${rotationAngle} 150 150)`);
    requestAnimationFrame(animate);
  }
  animate();
</script>
<!-- Adds vibrant animated glow effects with pulsing circles and rotating lines for intense visual impact -->
```
ðŸ’¡ Enhanced with pulsating central glow, vibrant gradient lines, and continuous rotation for a dramatically more engaging animated SVG visual.
